title: K.IC.1
text: The student will identify and discuss how computing technologies impact people's lives.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: List computing technologies found in the classroom, home, and the community.
Identify how computing technologies are used in daily tasks.
Discuss healthy habits for using computing technologies.

title: K.IC.2
text: The student will discuss and describe how different careers use computing technologies.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Describe how computing technologies are used in various careers.
Discuss the advantages of using computing technologies in different careers.
Identify local jobs that utilize computing technologies.
